means: 大游览车( charabanc的名词复数 )

list.abs: chara 拟丽藻属, charabanc 大型游览车, chara 查拉镀

entry.def: A charabanc is a large old-fashioned coach with several rows of seats. Charabancs were used especially for taking people on trips or on holiday.

auth_sentence.content: Charabancs and monstrous hordes of hikers are blots upon the landscape.
auth_sentence.res_content: Charabancs and monstrous hordes of hikers are blots upon the landscape.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Charabancs and monstrous hordes of hikers are blots upon the landscape.
